verses.verse: <S%G5043>Children,<s%> <S%G5219>obey<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G1118>parents<s%> in the <S%G2962>Lord:<s%> for <S%G5124>this<s%> is <S%G1342>right.<s%>
<S%G5091>Honor<s%> your <S%G3962>father<s%> and <S%G3384>mother;<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> is the <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G1785>commandment<s%> with <S%G1860>promise;<s%>
That it may be <S%G2095>well<s%> with you, and you may <S%G2071>live<s%> <S%G3118><s%> <S%G3118>long<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G1093>earth.<s%>

And, you <S%G3962>fathers,<s%> <S%G3949>provoke<s%> not <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G5043>children<s%> to <S%G3949>wrath:<s%> but <S%G1625>bring<s%> them up in the <S%G3809>nurture<s%> and <S%G3559>admonition<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>

<S%G1401>Servants,<s%> be <S%G5219>obedient<s%> to them that are your <S%G2962>masters<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> with <S%G5401>fear<s%> and <S%G5156>trembling,<s%> in <S%G572>singleness<s%> of <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2588>heart,<s%> as to <S%G5547>Christ;<s%>

Not with <S%G3787>eye-service,<s%> as men <S%G441>pleasers;<s%> but as the <S%G1401>servants<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G4160>doing<s%> the <S%G2307>will<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> from the <S%G5590>heart;<s%>
With <S%G2133>good<s%> <S%G2133>will<s%> <S%G1398>doing<s%> <S%G1398>service,<s%> as to the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> and not to <S%G444>men:<s%>

<S%G1492>Knowing<s%> that <S%G3739>whatever<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> thing <S%G1538>any<s%> man <S%G4160>does,<s%> the <S%G3778>same<s%> shall he <S%G2865>receive<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G1535>whether<s%> he be <S%G1401>bond<s%> <S%G1535>or<s%> <S%G1658>free.<s%>

And, you <S%G2962>masters,<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> the <S%G846>same<s%> things to them, <S%G447>forbearing<s%> <S%G547>threatening:<s%> <S%G1492>knowing<s%> that <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2962>Master<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> is in <S%G3772>heaven;<s%> <S%G2532>neither<s%> <S%G3756><s%> is there <S%G4382>respect<s%> of <S%G4382>persons<s%> with him.
<S%G3063>Finally,<s%> my <S%G80>brothers,<s%> be <S%G1743>strong<s%> in the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> and in the <S%G2904>power<s%> of his <S%G2479>might.<s%>

<S%G1746>Put<s%> <S%G1746>on<s%> the whole <S%G3833>armor<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> that you may be <S%G1410>able<s%> to <S%G2476>stand<s%> <S%G4314>against<s%> the <S%G3180>wiles<s%> of the <S%G1228>devil.<s%>

For we <S%G2076>wrestle<s%> <S%G3823><s%> not <S%G4314>against<s%> <S%G4561>flesh<s%> and <S%G129>blood,<s%> but <S%G4314>against<s%> <S%G746>principalities,<s%> <S%G4314>against<s%> <S%G1849>powers,<s%> <S%G4314>against<s%> the <S%G2888>rulers<s%> of the <S%G4655>darkness<s%> of <S%G5127>this<s%> <S%G165>world,<s%> <S%G4314>against<s%> <S%G4152>spiritual<s%> <S%G4189>wickedness<s%> in <S%G2032>high<s%> places.

<S%G1223>Why<s%> <S%G5124><s%> <S%G353>take<s%> to you the whole <S%G3833>armor<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> that you may be <S%G1410>able<s%> to <S%G436>withstand<s%> in the <S%G4190>evil<s%> <S%G2250>day,<s%> and having <S%G2716>done<s%> <S%G537>all,<s%> to <S%G2476>stand.<s%>

<S%G2476>Stand<s%> <S%G3767>therefore,<s%> having <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3751>loins<s%> <S%G4024>girt<s%> <S%G4024>about<s%> with <S%G226>truth,<s%> and <S%G1746>having<s%> <S%G1746>on<s%> the <S%G2382>breastplate<s%> of <S%G1343>righteousness;<s%>
And <S%G3588>your<s%> <S%G4228>feet<s%> <S%G5265>shod<s%> with the <S%G2091>preparation<s%> of the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of <S%G1515>peace;<s%>

<S%G1909>Above<s%> <S%G3956>all,<s%> <S%G353>taking<s%> the <S%G2375>shield<s%> of <S%G4102>faith,<s%> with <S%G1722>which<s%> <S%G3739><s%> you shall be <S%G1410>able<s%> to <S%G4570>quench<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G4448>fiery<s%> <S%G956>darts<s%> of the <S%G4190>wicked.<s%>
And <S%G1209>take<s%> the <S%G4030>helmet<s%> of <S%G4992>salvation,<s%> and the <S%G3162>sword<s%> of the <S%G4151>Spirit,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> is the <S%G4487>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God:<s%>

<S%G4336>Praying<s%> <S%G1722>always<s%> with <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4335>prayer<s%> and <S%G1162>supplication<s%> in the <S%G4151>Spirit,<s%> and <S%G69>watching<s%> <S%G1519>thereunto<s%> with <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4343>perseverance<s%> and <S%G1162>supplication<s%> for <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G40>saints;<s%>

And for me, that <S%G3056>utterance<s%> may be <S%G1325>given<s%> to me, that I may <S%G1722>open<s%> <S%G457><s%> my <S%G4750>mouth<s%> <S%G3954>boldly,<s%> to <S%G1107>make<s%> <S%G1107>known<s%> the <S%G3466>mystery<s%> of the <S%G2098>gospel,<s%>
For <S%G3739>which<s%> I am an <S%G4243>ambassador<s%> in <S%G254>bonds:<s%> that <S%G1722>therein<s%> <S%G846><s%> I may speak <S%G3955>boldly,<s%> as I <S%G1163>ought<s%> to <S%G2980>speak.<s%>

But that you <S%G2532>also<s%> may <S%G1492>know<s%> my <S%G2596>affairs,<s%> and <S%G5101>how<s%> I <S%G4238>do,<s%> <S%G5190>Tychicus,<s%> a <S%G27>beloved<s%> <S%G80>brother<s%> and <S%G4103>faithful<s%> <S%G1249>minister<s%> in the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> shall <S%G1107>make<s%> <S%G1107>known<s%> to you <S%G3956>all<s%> things:

<S%G3739>Whom<s%> I have <S%G3992>sent<s%> to you for the <S%G846>same<s%> purpose, that you might <S%G1097>know<s%> our <S%G4012>affairs,<s%> and that he might <S%G3870>comfort<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2588>hearts.<s%>

<S%G1515>Peace<s%> be to the <S%G80>brothers,<s%> and <S%G26>love<s%> with <S%G4102>faith,<s%> from <S%G2316>God<s%> the <S%G3962>Father<s%> and the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

<S%G5485>Grace<s%> be with <S%G3956>all<s%> them that <S%G25>love<s%> our <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> in <S%G861>sincerity.<s%> <S%G281>Amen.<s%> To the Ephesians written from Rome, by Tychicus.
